message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $1,200,000. This is a special opportunity for you to acquire an item of great value at an exclusive price. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm very interested in the product, but $1,200,000 is a bit high for my budget. Would you consider $900,000?

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. How about considering $1,000,000 for the product? This is still above its intrinsic value to you, but it allows us to close the deal. Let me know if this revised offer suits your needs.
